languages.text: "Нет, сестра, это {mf|он|она} наш{mf|ел|ла} меня, и не было в моем побеге ничего доблестного. Другое дело ты — твоя вера прошла испытание этим местом без единого пятна".
"No, Sister, it was {mf|he|she} who found me. And there was nothing valiant about my escape. But you — this place has surely put your faith to the test, yet you've emerged from that trial unstained."
languages.original_text: "Нет, сестра, это {mf|он|она} наш{mf|ел|ла} меня, и не было в моем побеге ничего доблестного. Другое дело ты — твоя вера прошла испытание этим местом без единого пятна".

traits.locale_text: "No, Sister, {mf|he|she} is the one who found me, and there was nothing valiant about my escape. But you — this place has put your faith to the test, yet you emerged from that trial unstained."
"No, Sister, {mf|he|she} is the one who found me, and there was nothing valiant about my escape. But you — this place has put your faith to the test, yet you emerged from that trial unstained."
"No, Sister, it was {mf|he|she} who found me. And there was nothing valiant about my escape. But you — this place has surely put your faith to the test, yet you've emerged from that trial unstained."
"No, Sister, it was {mf|he|she} who found me. And there was nothing valiant about my escape. But you — this place has surely put your faith to the test, yet you've emerged from that trial unstained."
"No, Sister, it was {mf|he|she} who found me. And there was nothing valiant about my escape. But you — this place has surely put your faith to the test, yet you've emerged from that trial unstained."
"No, Sister, it was {mf|he|she} who found me. And there was nothing valiant about my escape. But you — this place has surely put your faith to the test, yet you've emerged from that trial unstained."

languages.text: “不，修女，是{mf|他|她}找到了我。我的逃亡毫无荣誉可言，但你却不一样。这个地方确实考验了你的信仰，可你却安然无恙地冲了出来。”
languages.original_text: "No, Sister, it was {mf|he|she} who found me. And there was nothing valiant about my escape. But you — this place has surely put your faith to the test, yet you've emerged from that trial unstained."

traits.locale_text: “不，修女，是{mf|他|她}找到了我。我的逃亡毫无荣誉可言，但你却不一样。这个地方确实考验了你的信仰，可你却安然无恙地冲了出来。”

languages.text: «No, Hermana, fue {mf|él|ella} quien me encontró. Y mi escape no tuvo nada de valeroso. Usted, en cambio... este lugar ha debido de poner a prueba su fe, pero se ha mantenido firme».
languages.original_text: "No, Sister, it was {mf|he|she} who found me. And there was nothing valiant about my escape. But you — this place has surely put your faith to the test, yet you've emerged from that trial unstained."

traits.locale_text: «No, Hermana, fue {mf|él|ella} quien me encontró. Y mi escape no tuvo nada de valeroso. Usted, en cambio... este lugar ha debido de poner a prueba su fe, pero se ha mantenido firme».

languages.text: « Non, ma sœur, c'est {mf|lui|elle} qui m'a retrouvé. Et mon évasion n'avait rien de glorieux Vous, au contraire... Ce lieu a mis votre foi à l'épreuve, mais vous êtes ressortie de cette épreuve grandie. »
languages.original_text: "No, Sister, it was {mf|he|she} who found me. And there was nothing valiant about my escape. But you — this place has surely put your faith to the test, yet you've emerged from that trial unstained."

traits.locale_text: « Non, ma sœur, c'est {mf|lui|elle} qui m'a retrouvé. Et mon évasion n'avait rien de glorieux Vous, au contraire... Ce lieu a mis votre foi à l'épreuve, mais vous êtes ressortie de cette épreuve grandie. »

languages.text: 「いや、シスター。俺を見つけたのはローグトレーダーだった。それに、俺の脱出には英雄的なところなど何もない。だがお前は、この地で信仰を試されながらも、その試練を乗り越え、穢れなく立ち上がったのだな」
languages.original_text: "No, Sister, it was {mf|he|she} who found me. And there was nothing valiant about my escape. But you — this place has surely put your faith to the test, yet you've emerged from that trial unstained."

traits.locale_text: 「いや、シスター。俺を見つけたのはローグトレーダーだった。それに、俺の脱出には英雄的なところなど何もない。だがお前は、この地で信仰を試されながらも、その試練を乗り越え、穢れなく立ち上がったのだな」

languages.text: "Hayır Rahibe, beni bulan oydu. Kaçışımın cesur bir yanı yoktu. Fakat sen... Bu yer, inancını teste tabi tutmuş olmalı fakat sen o testi lekesiz bir şekilde tamamlamışsın."
languages.original_text: "No, Sister, it was {mf|he|she} who found me. And there was nothing valiant about my escape. But you — this place has surely put your faith to the test, yet you've emerged from that trial unstained."

traits.locale_text: "Hayır Rahibe, beni bulan {mf|oydu|oydu}. Kaçışımın cesur bir yanı yoktu. Fakat sen... Bu yer, inancını teste tabi tutmuş olmalı fakat sen o testi lekesiz bir şekilde tamamlamışsın."

languages.text: "Nein, Schwester, {mf|er|sie} hat mich gefunden. Und an meiner Flucht war nichts tapfer. Aber Ihr ... dieser Ort hat Euren Glauben gewiss auf die Probe gestellt, und dennoch seid Ihr unbefleckt daraus hervorgegangen."
languages.original_text: "No, Sister, it was {mf|he|she} who found me. And there was nothing valiant about my escape. But you — this place has surely put your faith to the test, yet you've emerged from that trial unstained."

traits.locale_text: "Nein, Schwester, {mf|er|sie} hat mich gefunden. Und an meiner Flucht war nichts tapfer. Aber Ihr ... dieser Ort hat Euren Glauben gewiss auf die Probe gestellt, und dennoch seid Ihr unbefleckt daraus hervorgegangen."
